overview: Missy Martinez & Samantha St. James: Missy and Samantha enjoy the view the only way they know how...  Wanda Lust & Slut Deb:  Wanda and Deb heat up the sauna...  Even Moore & Malaysia Ford:  Even and Malaysia can't keep their chubby hands off of each other... Jessica D'Vine & Brooke Scott: Brooke and Jessica have each other as an appetizer before dinner...
tagline: Featuring Missy Martinez & Samantha St. James
title: Chubby Lesbians in Love
